comment: Great Professor! Just come to class and you will be fine.

She is literally the most critical grader I have ever had in a teacher. If it were not for all of the (minus 1's) on my test, I would have had an easy A. She makes you interpret test questions word for word or she will mark off. So this means you have to study extra hard. I, however, did not go to class and managed to pull an 89 before the final.

Penelope is a sweet lady who really tries her best to pass on the information of the course. The class is a tough one, but can be easily learned. She is a meticulous grader though. Can be an easy A if you do all the homework, attend every class, etc. The final exam is optional, so in theory, if you have an A after all three tests, you have an A.
Awsome Professor.  If you go to class and do the homework (which I did not do till before the test, as a review) you will make an A.  I loved her.
SHe is great professor, I would like to see her in any courses in the future.
